title: Always Friends
description: Megan Jacobs is home from college with her new boyfriend.Ryder Janson is staying out of jail and has a steady job now that he's out of high school.Summer starts with a bang for these two on a camping trip at the lake. Megan's boyfriend cheats on her with her best friend and Ryder couldn't be happier.Both have kept their feelings for each other hidden, but when Ryder is the friend Megan needs, will they both act on those feelings or keep pretending friendship is all they want?
author: J.D. Rivera
